h2_title: Wandering Wight Boss Fight and Guide
content: What makes the Wandering Wight such a tough opponent isn’t just the massive damage he can deal with a single attack, but the deceptive power and speed some of his attacks can have. Many times the Wight will default to attacking with two lengthy foot stomps, which can be easy to dodge once you get the timing down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wandering_Wight.md', within the main section titled 'Wandering Wight', specifically from the subsection 'Wandering Wight Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
What makes the Wandering Wight such a tough opponent isn’t just the massive damage he can deal with a single attack, but the deceptive power and speed some of his attacks can have. Many times the Wight will default to attacking with two lengthy foot stomps, which can be easy to dodge once you get the timing down.
